column4: hello everyone! my computer takes about 2 minutes to star, so i guess theres something wrong with it. how can I fix it?
K3nto: when booting up, Ctrl+Alt+F6 and then Ctrl+Alt+F8 should bring up what's actually happening in the background. That way, you can pinpoint the problem.
thank you very much, ill do that now to see the issue :)
